description: "Global Flows" engages students in academic and public discourses that emphasize inclusivity,
cross-cultural understanding, and global citizenship. We will examine the movement of objects,
ideas, and people across history and within and outside of Asia, helping students develop a
historical foundation for their future study of Asia. As a first-year seminar, students will also
focus on building community as well as skills for succeeding at college. This is the first course
